boardgame.description: In this classic word game, players use their seven drawn letter-tiles to form words on the gameboard. Each word laid out earns points based on the commonality of the letters used, with certain board spaces giving bonuses. But a word can only be played if it uses at least one already-played tile or adds to an already-played word. This leads to slightly tactical play, as potential words are rejected because they would give an opponent too much access to the better bonus spaces._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Skip-a-cross was licensed by Selchow _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Righter and manufactured by Cadaco. Both games have identical rules but Skip-a-cross has tiles and racks made of cardboard instead of wood. The game was also published because not enough Scrabble games were manufactured to meet the demand._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: SCRABBLE DELUXE EDITION 1987 Selchow _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Righter. Complete with 100 burgundy-finished hardwood tiles, tile draw-string bag, 4 wood tile racks, rule book, revolving board w/recessed grid. If you play Scrabble a lot, then this is the version to have with the board that spins around to face the player whose turn it is. Shipping weight is 5 pounds. Box showing wear with one broken corner. Gameboard _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; pieces are in Excellent condition.

Multiple copies. Milton Bradley or Selchow _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Richter versions. All in very good condition, with all pieces present. Wooden tiles. Boxes might show a little wear, but components are in great shape.

Premier Luxury edition. Wood rotating board with lined storage drawers, faux ivory tiles, leather tile bag, timer, scorepad book. Great condition. Does not have original outer box. Very heavy--actual shipping based on zip code.

Deluxe Scrabble. Blue box version. Some wear along one edge of the top box lid, otherwise new and never played. Has the most excellent turntable and super nice stained tiles. I welcome international buyers!
some box damage, but complete

3C Game Card Case (for Dominion, CCG_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s, etc) For addition photos, details and availability, please refer page 2 (scroll to the bottom) of the following BGG forum thread... http://www.boardgamegeek.com/thread/557195/dominion-custom-storage-chest-for-base-game-and-ex/page/2
Reserved for auction winner mmullis. German language Scrabble Risk German language Monopoly Shipping costs are $10.00
Nostalgia Edition. Reserved for jodyjm13 from the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Save the Feline_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; auction. Thanks!

This is a large blue box 1977 version of Deluxe Scrabble. It comes with maroon colored wooden tiles, and nice turntable, a plastic bag for the tiles, and four plastic tile trays. This _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;deluxe_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; version from 1977 is hard to find, and makes a great game to use for your Scrabble play. It is complete and in very nice condition. Also, the photo shows the correct version of the game, but is not an actual photo of the one for sale. It is, however, indicative of the condition of the game.

_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Scrabble - Michael Graves Edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; reserved for _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Gypsum_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; - _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Goodwill_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; auction. This price includes _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Twixt - Avalon Hill_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;.
